name: Wasted Time
wikiSummary: "Wasted Time" is the second single taken from the Youth and Young Manhood album by the American rock band Kings of Leon. The song reached number 51 on the UK Singles Chart.
wikiText:
"Wasted Time" is the second single taken from the Youth and Young Manhood album by the American rock band Kings of Leon. The song reached number 51 on the UK Singles Chart.
